org.apache.flink.yarn

类 YarnResourceManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.runtime.rpc.RpcEndpoint
      • org.apache.flink.runtime.rpc.FencedRpcEndpoint<ResourceManagerId>
        • org.apache.flink.runtime.resourcemanager.ResourceManager<ResourceID>
          • org.apache.flink.yarn.YarnResourceManager
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    LeaderContender, ResourceManagerGateway, FencedRpcGateway<ResourceManagerId>, RpcGateway, org.apache.hadoop.yarn.client.api.async.AMRMClientAsync.CallbackHandler

    public class YarnResourceManager
extends ResourceManager<ResourceID>
implements org.apache.hadoop.yarn.client.api.async.AMRMClientAsync.CallbackHandler
    The yarn implementation of the resource manager. Used when the system is started via the resource framework YARN.

    • 嵌套类概要

      • 从类继承的嵌套类/接口 org.apache.flink.runtime.rpc.RpcEndpoint

        RpcEndpoint.MainThreadExecutor

        static final java.lang.String ENV_FLINK_NODE_ID
        Environment variable name of the hostname given by the YARN. In task executor we use the hostnames given by YARN consistently throughout akka

        常量字段值

    • 方法详细资料

      • initialize

        protected void initialize()
                   throws ResourceManagerException
        从类复制的说明: ResourceManager
        Initializes the framework specific components.
        指定者:
        initialize 在类中 ResourceManager<ResourceID>
        抛出:
        ResourceManagerException - which occurs during initialization and causes the resource manager to fail.

      • postStop

        public void postStop()
              throws java.lang.Exception
        从类复制的说明: RpcEndpoint
        User overridable callback.

        This method is called when the RpcEndpoint is being shut down. The method is guaranteed to be executed in the main thread context and can be used to clean up internal state. IMPORTANT: This method should never be called directly by the user.

        覆盖:
        postStop 在类中 ResourceManager<ResourceID>
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - if an error occurs. The exception is returned as result of the termination future.

      • shutDownApplication

        protected void shutDownApplication(ApplicationStatus finalStatus,
                                   java.lang.String optionalDiagnostics)
        从类复制的说明: ResourceManager
        The framework specific code for shutting down the application. This should report the application's final status and shut down the resource manager cleanly.

        This method also needs to make sure all pending containers that are not registered yet are returned.

        指定者:
        shutDownApplication 在类中 ResourceManager<ResourceID>
        参数:
        finalStatus - The application status to report.
        optionalDiagnostics - An optional diagnostics message.

        指定者:

        参数:

        返回:

      • generatePriority

        private int generatePriority(ResourceProfile resourceProfile)
        Generate priority by given resource profile. Priority is only used for distinguishing request of different resource.
        参数:

        返回:
        The priority of this resource profile.
